name: Survival Chaos
description:
GAMEPLAY

This is a chaotic and clourful survival game. The aim is to survive as long as you can with the gun(kinda grenade launcher :D) you are given..

CONTROLS

W A S D - Movement

SpaceBar - Jump

Mouse(LeftButton) - Fires a explosive

L - Spawns allies to help you survive(Active every 30 seconds)

BUGS

The bugs observed in the game do not make the game unplayable so there is nothing to worry. As of the bugs

  1. The ammo and health pickUps are not working.
  2. The audio for the player bullets is not working properly.
  3.  Enemies and Allies might get stuck in a unending stalemate. This bug is very rarely observed(like 1 out of 10 times) but when it happen I recommend to restart the level.

Hope You Enjoy The Game and Tell me your Thoughts On it!!!!

Have A Good Day!!
